timeline.bodyText: Do we know how many other types there are?
timeline.author: Mekle001

replies.bodyText: too many, this will be fixed for the other ones post-building rework
replies.author: Raycoms

replies.bodyText: Ok. If that's going to be a while, it might make sense to do an interface for this, that we propagate as needed.
replies.author: Mekle001
